name: JACK RAINBOW
description:
A Retro B&W FPS. Clear the building in 5min with just your handgun and a sledge hammer.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Sledge / Melee

E - Up Ladder

F - Down Ladder

Space - Skip

All Art, Code & Audio created for the B&W Game Jam
